name: 劉傳信
objective:
探討台灣傳統家具產業的歷史脈絡與傳統生產模式，台灣傳統板式家具生產與系統板式家具生產之間的主要差異，並從「生產方式」、「設計流程」、「設備應用」、「標準化程度」與「管理模式」分析產業導入自動化技術後的轉型模式，進而探討 AI 世代對家具設計與空間製造的影響，激發學生創意思維，提出 AI 導向的家具創新，綜合所有因素做出家具設計方案
 This study explores the historical development and traditional production models of Taiwan’s furniture industry, focusing on the key differences between conventional panel furniture production and system panel furniture production. It further analyzes the industry’s transformation following the adoption of automation technologies from the perspectives of production methods, design processes, equipment application, degree of standardization, and management models. Additionally, the study examines the impact of the AI era on furniture design and manufacturing, aiming to stimulate students’ creative thinking and promote the development of AI-driven innovative furniture design solutions. By integrating all of these factors, the goal is to formulate comprehensive and forward-thinking design proposals.
